name: Aroma de Nicaragua - Original Blend Ecuador - Robusto
brand: Aroma de Nicaragua, Original Blend Ecuador
additionalNotes: Aroma de Nicaragua is a High Quality Cigar coming from Nicaragua where all the winner brands are born, over 25 years of experience come together harvesting and selecting the finest leaves of Tobacco. According to the company, the Nicaraguan tobacco used in its blends is grown all four of the growing regions of the country: Condega, Estel√≠, Jalapa and Ometepe. Original Blend Ecuador is the first of four different blends utilizing the same binder and filler tobacco combination from Nicaragua, but different wrappers; in this case, a wrapper grown in Ecuador.
